title.en: Merched y Wawr Maenclochog Branch - Visiting North Wales
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Maenclochog - Ymweld â Gogledd Cymru

description.en:
Cafwyd arian Loteri i Gangen Maenclochog o Ferched y Wawr ymweld â Gogledd Cymru, Mehefin 2007.  Dyma lun o aelodau cyn iddyn nhw ymweld â’r Electric Mountain, Llanberis – Gorsaf Drydan Dinorwig. Rhes gefn – Eiry Phillips, Sheila Vaughan, Gina Lewis, Aerona Edwards, Mattie Lewis, Mona Lewis, Gretta Gibby, Eira Rowlands, Ogwen Phillips, Eirwen Gibby, Gillian Phillips a Vi Edwards
Rhes flaen – Maureen George, Becky Davies, Tryphena Williams, Beryl John a Mary Llewellyn
